name: Human Leak
description:
That suspicious-looking burrito you ate early probably wasn't your greatest idea?

Now it's acting up and causing major problems in your stomach.

It's the worse fucking day! The office is a mess and furniture is blocking the way.

You can't hold in your farts so be careful not to embarrass yourself in front of the hot ladies.

But gain some dignity when you hit the managers with poo.

But hurry! Find the toilet before you're disgraced yourself and committed social suicide.
